props.reverse: Displays reversed progress (right to left in LTR mode and left to right in RTL)
props.rounded: Adds a border radius to the progress component
props.stream: An alternative style for portraying loading that works in tandem with **buffer-value**
props.striped: Adds a stripe background to the filled portion of the progress component

slots.default: Provides the current value of the component

events.change: Emitted when the component value is changed by user interaction
